mapper.select: select select game_code,game_type,game_day,game_gender, DATE_FORMAT(game_time, '%H') AS game_time,level, game_macth,game_place,close,game_pnum,game_mag,field_name, field_address,game_minp,game_maxp,field_code,game_mag,game_pay from gamelist where game_type = #{gameType} limit 0,15

select select game_code,game_type,game_day,game_gender, DATE_FORMAT(game_time, '%H') AS game_time,level, game_macth,game_place,close,game_pnum,game_mag,field_name, field_address,game_minp,game_maxp,field_code,game_mag,game_pay from gamelist where game_type = #{gameType} limit #{userCode},15

select select game_code,game_type,game_day,game_gender, DATE_FORMAT(game_time, '%H') AS game_time,level, game_macth,game_place,close,game_pnum,game_mag,field_name, field_address,game_minp,game_maxp,field_code,game_mag,game_pay from gamelist
and DATE_FORMAT(game_day, '%Y-%m-%d') like concat('%',#{gameDay},'%')
and game_code like concat('%',#{gameCode},'%')
and game_time like concat('%',#{gameTime},'%')
and field_address like concat('%', #{field_address},'%')
and game_gender like concat('%', #{gameGender},'%')
and level like concat('%', #{level},'%')
and game_macth like concat('%', #{gameMacth},'%')
and game_type like concat('%', #{gameType},'%')
limit #{num},15
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `gamelist` (`game_type`, `field_name`, `field_address`, `field_code`, `game_day`, `game_time`, `level`, `game_gender`, `game_place`, `game_macth`, `close`, `game_minp`, `game_maxp`, `game_pnum`, `game_mag`, `game_magcode`,`game_pay`, `uteam_pay`) VALUES ('S', #{fieldName}, #{fieldAddress}, #{fieldCode}, #{gameDay}, '08:00:00', '프로1', '남성', #{gamePlace}, #{gameMacth}, 'true', #{gameMinp}, #{gameMaxp}, 0, #{gameMag},#{gameMagcode}, 10000, NULL), ('S', #{fieldName}, #{fieldAddress}, #{fieldCode}, #{gameDay}, '10:00:00', '프로1', '남성', #{gamePlace}, #{gameMacth}, 'true', #{gameMinp}, #{gameMaxp}, 0, #{gameMag},#{gameMagcode}, 10000, NULL), ('S', #{fieldName}, #{fieldAddress}, #{fieldCode}, #{gameDay}, '16:00:00', '프로1', '남성', #{gamePlace}, #{gameMacth}, 'true', #{gameMinp}, #{gameMaxp}, 0, #{gameMag},#{gameMagcode}, 10000, NULL), ('S', #{fieldName}, #{fieldAddress}, #{fieldCode}, #{gameDay}, '20:00:00', '프로1', '남성', #{gamePlace}, #{gameMacth}, 'true', #{gameMinp}, #{gameMaxp}, 0, #{gameMag},#{gameMagcode}, 10000, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT m.mgr_code,m.field_code,m.prefer_area,m.mgr_state,m.user_code,i.user_name FROM manager_history m JOIN user_info i ON m.user_code = i.user_code WHERE mgr_state = 'PASS' AND field_code = #{fieldCode} GROUP BY field_code
